channel.title: Access Tech Weekly
channel.description: Welcome to Access Tech Weekly, where we discuss the latest in technology from a blindness perspective.
channel.copyright: Attribution Required. Not for commercial use.
channel.itunes:author: Wesley Martin and Guests, with Music by Andre Louis

item.title: iPhone SE 4th Gen Will Launch Next Week, Running AI Locally, Capsys Has a New Mobility Aid, and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: Next Friday, Amazon will no longer let you download your Kindle books. Google Play Books on iOS will now let you complete your purchases through the Google website. Google Tasks is now it's own website, I started using Visual Studio Code, Apple released a new iPhone, and more.

item.title: iPhone SE 4th Gen Will Launch Next Week, Running AI Locally, Capsys Has a New Mobility Aid, and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: iPhone SE 4th Generation will be released next week. Apple has launched a TV app for android. Capsys has launched a new product, the KapX Mobility Aid. Innosearch AI is now offering 1% unlimited cashback on all orders. It's Be My Eyes 10th anniversary! Plus, My Mantis is in surgery, I tried running AI locally, and so much more.

item.title: News Tidbits, Galaxy Unpacked, and A Long Tyrade about the Joys of Custom Domains
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: This time, CES, the Consumer Electronics Show, is underway, Samsung has announced the Galaxy Unpacked event, and more! Music by Andre Louis. andrelouis.com.

item.title: Meta Glasses and iOS Updates and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: You can now call 1-800-Chat-GPT, or message it on WhatsApp. The Meta Ray-Ban Glasses get a new update, as well as iOS. Also, Google's NotebookLM gets an interactive audio overview mode where you can talk to two AI "podcast hosts" about anything. Get in touch! Call 570-500-0665, or email AccessTechWeekly@Yahoo.com. Also visit our website.

item.title: Remote Incident Manager AI Tools, and APH Braille Displays Updates
item.author: Wesley Martin with Mike Calvo and Jennifer Wenzel, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: In this episode, I'll talk to Mike Calvo of Pneuma Solutions about Remote Incident Manager, and RIM AI Tools. Jennifer Wenzel is on the podcast with me to discuss APH Braille displays updates, and I demonstrate some of the new features on the Mantis Q40.
